content: लोभः [लुभ्-भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Covetousness, avarice, greed, cupidity; लोभश्चेदगुणेन किं <ls>Bh. 2. 55.</ls> {@--2@} Desire for, longing after (with <ab>gen.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); कंकणस्य तु लोभेन <ls>H. 1. 5</ls>; आर्शलोभात् <ls>Me. 103.</ls> {@--3@} Avarice personified (one of the six enemies of man).
